entities.name: bathilda bagshot
entities.description: Bathilda Bagshot is mentioned as a person who still lives in Godric's Hollow. She is described as the one who said Harry had skinny ankles at Ginny's wedding.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is mentioned as the location where Bathilda Bagshot still lives.

entities.name: muriel
entities.description: Muriel is mentioned as Ginny's great-aunt who said Harry had skinny ankles at her wedding.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the one whose wedding was attended by Muriel.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron's name is hinted at but not directly mentioned.

relationships.description: Bathilda Bagshot lives in Godric's Hollow.
Bathilda Bagshot commented on Harry's ankles at Ginny's wedding.
